name: Devsoul Extra Product options
author: Devsoul

sections.description:
Unlocking Customer Choice with WooCommerce Extra Product Options

Enhance your customers’ shopping journey with Woocommerce extra product options plugin. These customizable features offer a wide range of choices, from sizes to colors, elevating personalization and satisfaction. From simple text fields to advanced drop downs and file uploads, our plugin offers 17 diverse field types to cater to your unique needs.

Short Description

Woocommerce extra product options offer diverse choices such as dropdowns, radio buttons, swatches. Bulk or individual setup, role-based limits etc.

Optimize Your Store with Custom Product Options

This extra product option plugin help you to easily organize your WooCommerce store. You can select products, categories, or tags to apply options to, or opt for universal application across all products.

Customizing user roles help you to control who sees these options, ensuring a personalized shopping experience for each customer segment.

Create an attractive, personalized environment where customers can easily find what they need and enjoy their shopping journey.

Effortless Field Creation and Management

Expand or collapse fields with ease, and add new fields effortlessly with just a click. Utilize our Export/Import CSV feature for convenient bulk management of options, simplifying your workflow and saving valuable time.

Versatile Field Types for Every Need

Choose from a wide array of field types to suit your requirements. From drop downs and checkboxes to file uploads and color switchers, our plugin offers flexibility and versatility.

Admins can even set field dependencies for dynamic interactions, enhancing the user experience. Whether it’s selecting sizes, colors, or inputting custom text, our plugin empowers admins to cater to diverse customer preferences effortlessly.

Features

*Display product options as drop-down menus, radio buttons, or swatches to match the style of your e-commerce website.
*Apply product options in bulk or individually for increased control and efficiency.
*Offer multiple options for a single product, such as size, color, or material
*Limit product options by user role for added control and security.
*Set different prices for different options to provide a level of adaptability and versatility.
*Fields Type.
*Dropdown
*Multi-select
*Checkboxes
*Input text
*Text area
*File Upload
*Number
*Radio
*Quantity
*Color
*Image
*Switcher
*Image
*Date Picker
*Email
*Password
*Time Picker
*Telephone

Try Our Premium Plugin

  • Ethisalat PAyment Gateway – Payment Gateway for Arab Amarates.
  • Chat GPT – Chat GPT Pro.
  • WooCommerce Auto Repeat Order – Auto Repeat order through which you can set frquency to ready audo on selected days.
  • WooCommerce Chained Product – make you chain with products.
  • WooCommerce Product Adds on Pro – pro version with extra features.
  • WooCommerce Smart Clear Cart – One Click Clear Cart.
  • WooCommerce Cart Discount – Give Discount and to your customer and get sale.
  • WooCommerce Local Deliver – Local Delivery.

Contact US

  • Feel Free to contact Us for support, installation or customization.
sections.installation:
Download the .zip file.
Go to: WordPress Admin > Plugins > Add New and Upload Plugin with the file you downloaded with Choose File.
Install Now and Activate the extension.

You can also visit devsouls.store
